name: Compute Thought
description:
Compute Thought

(When the game asks you to "use keyboard", type the commands using your physical keyboard.)

By Merlijn Van Holder - @MerlijnVH

Postmortem & Source

A short cyberpunk graphic adventure game for the #Nar8 game jam. You are a detective, assigned with looking into a domestic violence situation.

#Nar8 is a game jam about telling a story. I'm a terrible writer.

It's possible you will experience strange or over-bright lighting on some hardware. Sorry for the inconvenience, the game was made in a short time for a game jam.
